edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class PageItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Condition, Directive, Question, QuestionBlock, RepeatingItemSet

    public abstract class PageItem
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class represents a single page item.

    • Method Detail

      • IsPageItemNode

        public static boolean IsPageItemNode(org.w3c.dom.Node n)
        Checks if the given DOM node is a Page Item or not based on the question type.
        Parameters:
        n - DOM Node whose validated is checked.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the Node is one of defined type else false.

      • MakeNewItem

        public static PageItem MakeNewItem(org.w3c.dom.Node n)
        CLASS HIERARCHY is triaged here - Edit this static function to add new subclasses.
        Parameters:
        n - DOM Node whose hierarchy is checked.
        Returns:
        PageItem Appropriate Item is returned based on the type of question.

        Throws exception when called, subclasses have to override this method.

      • getValueType

        public char getValueType()
        Default item stores value as an integer; override necessary only for other value types.
        Returns:
        char The flag type is returned.

      • isRequired

        public boolean isRequired()
        Returns boolean if field is required but default is always false - will be overwritten by subclass
        Returns:
        boolean Always returns false.

      • renderResults

        public java.lang.String renderResults(Page pg,
                             DataBank db,
                             java.lang.String whereclause,
                             java.util.Hashtable data)
        Returns the results of survey in form of string -- be overwritten by subclass.
        Parameters:
        pg - Page Object for which the results are to be rendered.
        db - Data Bank object to connect to the database.
        whereclause - whereclause to restrict the invitee selection.
        data - Hashtable which contains results.
        Returns:
        String Empty string is returned.

        Returns:
        String Empty string is returned.

        Returns the stem if the field is required and not filled out - will be overwritten by Question class.

        String Empty string is returned.
